channel.title: Creating your own RSPS for runescape accounts
channel.description: I am willing to code\create your own RSPS and i will run it, all you have to do is be the owner of it control the server tell me what you want on the server and what you want in the server :P.... Now I can host it practically 24/7 on my vps that i've been paying for; However I can only run around 6 servers at a time on my VPS.. SO therefore might aswell hurry up and get a server while theres still spots open, I will discuss what servers you can choose from and what you can pick from.. Scam?: No this isnt a scam i wouldent waste my time for a runescape account, only reason i would want a runescape account in return is because I wouldent want money for a project like this.. If you don't trust me thats fine, If you decide you want your account back on Runescape thats fine. -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Requirements to have a server: Must have a way to contact you MOPARSCAPE cannot be a way to contact you due to how slow it is to communicate with each other and how messaging back in forth, I prefer Skype\yahoo\MAINLY MSN. Must be on often\daily just incase something happens Must be dedicated, I don't work with people who cant handle this sort of stuff. Must have a runescape account above level 115 with atleast 1+ 99 OR an account with atleast 3 99s. Any cb Must be able to make your own website on smfforfree or some sort of website Must not be a total Dumb-A$$ -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Thank's......... Sincerly -Rizen

item.title: Creating your own RSPS for runescape accounts
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Sorry but we forbid the sale or exchange of anything on this website with the exception of SCAR scripts. All of our material is free. If you wish to help somebody with their server, go to the development teams section and offer your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating your own RSPS for runescape accounts
item.dc:creator: @flame255 flame255
item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

I am willing to code\create your own RSPS and i will run it, all you have to do is be the owner of it control the server tell me what you want on the server and what you want in the server :P… Now I can host it practically 24/7 on my vps that i’ve been paying for; However I can only run around 6 servers at a time on my VPS… SO therefore might aswell hurry up and get a server while theres still spots open, I will discuss what servers you can choose from and what you can pick from…
Scam?: No this isnt a scam i wouldent waste my time for a runescape account, only reason i would want a runescape account in return is because I wouldent want money for a project like this… If you don’t trust me thats fine, If you decide you want your account back on Runescape thats fine.

Requirements to have a server:
Must have a way to contact you MOPARSCAPE cannot be a way to contact you due to how slow it is to communicate with each other and how messaging back in forth, I prefer Skype\yahoo\MAINLY MSN.
Must be on often\daily just incase something happens
Must be dedicated, I don’t work with people who cant handle this sort of stuff.
Must have a runescape account above level 115 with atleast 1+ 99 OR an account with atleast 3 99s. Any cb
Must be able to make your own website on smfforfree or some sort of website
Must not be a total Dumb-A$$

Thank’s… Sincerly -Rizen

Read full topic
